# Take-home message

* Versioning w gir abd girhub (easy in rstudio)
* Do not modify original file, use script
* Csv or txt
* Rmardown pour vous forcer a commenter (cache = true et r code only)
* Ranger vos affaires en dossiers (compendium)
* Fns plutôt que répéter (graphes surtout)

---

# Not covered

* You may automate your process

* Put everything together in a research compendium

Drake, targets see [here](https://ropensci.org/blog/2021/02/03/targets/) and [there](https://books.ropensci.org/targets/), docker, rrtools, [groudhogs](http://groundhogr.com/), [packrat and renv](https://kevinushey-2020-rstudio-conf.netlify.app/slides.html#1)

* You don’t need to adopt all these practices at once; little by little, already great to set your mind in that direction
